channel.title: Comments on: DigiBnetwork Launches First DAB+ DIN Car Radio Receiver

item.title: By: Rolf Schurter
item.dc:creator: Rolf Schurter
item.description: Congratulations! - We are the Swiss DAB+ Broadcasting company and of course, as everybody, we also are impatiently awaiting the car radios in the market. Looks to be a great step forward!
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! – We are the Swiss DAB+ Broadcasting company and of course, as everybody, we also are impatiently awaiting the car radios in the market. Looks to be a great step forward!
